resources.string: There must be at least one true proposition. Add at least one proposal and select the checked box on the left to define which one is true.
Add at least one answer proposal and select the check box to the left to define which one or which ones are true. If only one proposal is filled in, the question will be an open-ended question
You are about to abandon editing your questionnaire. Changes made will not be saved.
You are about to leave the questionnaire edition. would you like to continue?
The previous question was not correctly filled.
Suppressing question and answers. Click to undo.
Your work is empty. no questions have been entered.
This Question is incomplete. Complete it and continue.
An unexpected error occurred during saving. Try again later.
The current page has not been correctly filled.
Sorry, edition of the current page is incomplete.
Cropping not supported by your device...
Please wait, crop processing is in progress ...
Give a name to your quick entry and enter the proposals that will be entered automatically.
Add a new entry
Add, edit and delete quick entry entries.
Invalid entry. the proposals are empty.
Invalid entry. The name of the entry can not be empty.
No question and answers found in this file.
Would you like to import questions and Answers from an existing quiz file or from a question-answers txt file?
Select the text file (*.txt) containing your Questions and Answers
Error retrieving Question and Answers from the selected txt file.

The txt files that can be transcribed into questions and answers by &appname; must follow a specific structure.
Click here for details about the structure of txt files to import.
Error retrieving questions and answers from the selected quiz file; it could be that it is not a valid Questionnaire (*.qcm) file.
Error retrieving question-answers contained in the selected file. You can consult the documentation to make sure that your \'txt\' file is structured so that it can be interpreted by &appname;.
Add a comment that provides additional information about the answer(s).
Can not open a file explorer
&appname; failed to launch a file explorer to allow you to browse the \'%1$s\' files on your disk.\n\nMake sure to install a modern file explorer and try again.
The copy of the questions-and-answers of this questionnaire is locked by password.

Warning, you will be able to add audio but you will not be able to read them on your device because the version of Android that you use is too old.\n\nYou must update your system to Android.5 or later to fully use this feature.
It seems that this device does not have hardware audio recording capability.
It appears that no audio recording application is currently installed on your device.\n\nPlease, install an audio recording application and try again.
Sorry, this type of question and answer is not supported by the current version of the application. You can search for a software update and try again!
Music to play in loop as ambient sound during the test\n%1$s

This question of type «Selection» has been turned into an open-ended question because it contains one and only one single answer proposal. Unfortunately, open-ended questions type doesn\'t support media into answer proposal. Please remove all medias such as pictures and sounds to this question. You can also either change the question type or add more answer proposal to make this question turn into real selection question type.
This type of question doesn\'t support media into answer proposal. Please remove all medias such as pictures and sounds to this question or change the question type.
Please wait, the saving is taking longer than expected...
Is your questionnaire getting too big for your device capabilities?
Do not show again for this quiz project

This may mean that your creation may already contain too much data for the current capabilities of your device.

Indeed, although there is no limit on the amount of question and answer you can add to your creations; the limit remains the capacities of your device (RAM, CPU, disk).

The more data your questionnaire contains, the more material resources it requires to be read or edited smoothly. If the sluggishness problem persists or worsens, it could mean that you may have exceeded the fluidity limits of your device's capabilities. To maintain fluidity, you will need to either moderate the amount of question-and-answers you add to your creation or use a device with greater computing capacity (CPU).
The project saving has took longer than normal.
Validating your working copy took longer than normal
Please wait, checking your working copy is taking longer than expected ...
Please wait during attached resources copying...

Sorry, the selected scoring policy is a system default scoring policy.\n\nYou can only modify or delete the scoring policies you have created on your own or re-edited by duplicating an existing rating policy.
